content:
Sure, here's an updated example of the JSON format that includes the manufacturer, model name, possible versions, and MIDI mappings of electronic drum kits:
```json
{
  "electronic_drums": [
    {
      "manufacturer": "Roland",
      "model": "TD-50KVX",
      "versions": [
        "TD-50KVX-S",
        "TD-50KVX-WL",
        "TD-50KVX-EXP",
        "TD-50KVX-ECOM"
      ],
      "midi_mappings": [
        {"kick": 36},
        {"snare": 38},
        {"hi_hat_closed": 42},
        {"hi_hat_open": 46},
        {"tom_1": 43},
        {"tom_2": 45},
        {"tom_3": 47},
        {"crash_cymbal": 49},
        {"ride_cymbal": 51}
      ]
    },
    {
      "manufacturer": "Roland",
      "model": "TD-17KVX",
      "versions": [
        "TD-17KVX-S",
        "TD-17KVX-WL",
        "TD-17KVX-EXP",
        "TD-17KVX-ECOM"
      ],
      "midi_mappings": [

        {"snare": 38},
        {"hi_hat_closed": 42},
        {"hi_hat_open": 46},
        {"tom_1": 48},
        {"tom_2": 45},
        {"tom_3": 43},
        {"crash_cymbal": 49},
        {"ride_cymbal": 51}
      ]
    },
    {
      "manufacturer": "Yamaha",
      "model": "DTX532K",
      "versions": [
        "DTX532K-S",
        "DTX532K-WL",
        "DTX532K-EXP",
        "DTX532K-ECOM"
      ],
      "midi_mappings": [
        {"kick": 36},
        {"snare": 38},
        {"hi_hat_closed": 42},
        {"hi_hat_open": 46},
        {"tom_1": 50},
        {"tom_2": 48},
        {"tom_3": 45},
        {"crash_cymbal": 49},
        {"ride_cymbal": 51}
      ]
    },
    {
      "manufacturer": "Alesis",

      "versions": [
        "Nitro Mesh Kit-S",
        "Nitro Mesh Kit-WL",

        "DrumIt Five MKII-ECOM"
      ],

        {"kick": 36},

```
